titleStmt.title: A mild, but searching expostulatory letter from the poor and plain-dealing farmers of the neighbouring villages to the men of Buckingham to the Right Worshipful the Bailiff, the Worshipful the Burgesses of the ancient, and sometimes famous corporation of Buckingham.

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: S.T., R.W. etc.

"On a late election of Members of Parliament in which the Burgh is said to have acted illegally. The letter is most abusive in tone and foul in language." Cf. Crawford, J.L.L. Cat. of Engl. broadsides, 174.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
